programs.program_name: Bachelor of Business (Honours) in Business Analytics and Digital Marketing

entry_requirements_raw.Diploma:
In Computer Science or Software Engineering or Information Technology or Information Systems or equivalent with a minimum CGPA of 2.5 and a credit in Mathematics at SPM level or its equivalent or Any other Diploma in Science and technology or business studies with a minimum CGPA of 2.5 may be admitted.  A credit in Mathematics at SPM level or its equivalent
Candidate with a credit in computing related subject at SPM or STPM level or its equivalent may be given preferential consideration.
entry_requirements_raw.STPM:
A pass in STPM with a minimum Grade C (GP 2.0) in any 2 subjects.  A credit in Mathematics at SPM level or its equivalent
Candidate with a credit in computing related subject at SPM or STPM level or its equivalent may be given preferential consideration.
entry_requirements_raw.Foundation:
A pass in Matriculation or Foundation studies with minimum CGPA of 2.0 and a credit in Mathematics at SPM level or its equivalent..  A credit in Mathematics at SPM level or its equivalent
Candidate with a credit in computing related subject at SPM or STPM level or its equivalent may be given preferential consideration.

entry_requirements_raw.Masters:
A master’s degree from Universiti Tun Abdul Razak or its equivalent from an institution of higher learning recognised by the Malaysian Government or any other equivalent qualification recognised by the University Senate..  There shall be no direct entry from the bachelor’s degree level to doctoral degree level.
Candidates with bachelor’s degree qualifications may apply to convert their candidacy to the doctoral degree programmes after a year’s enrolment in a master’s degree subject to
Having shown competency and capability in conducting research at doctoral degree level
A rigorous internal assessment by the University; - approval by the University Senate.
